title: Chris Hedges - An (Almost Complete Collection of Books
description:
I grabbed this off a different site. Now it's here. Thanks to the original uploader. I made no changes in the files.



What Every Person Should Know About War(2003) in epub and mobi formats.

War is a Force that Gives us Meaning (2003) in epub and mobi formats.

American Fascists: The Christian Right and the War on America (2008) in epub and mobi formats.

Collateral Damage: America's War Against Iraqi Civilians (2008) with Laila Al-Arian in pdf format.

Empire of Illusion: The End of Literacy and the Triumph of Spectacle (2010) in epub and mobi formats.

Death of the Liberal Class (2011) in epub and mobi formats.

The World As It Is: Dispatches on the Myth of Human Progress (2013) in epub and mobi formats.

Wages of Rebellion: The Moral Imperative of Revolt (2015) in epub and mobi formats
